title: Verify Roster should see a "RECOMMENDED 2X POINTS" tag for a F30 or R30 shifts

custom_steps_separated.content:
Login to a Pro (ex. 234567) who is a roster of a F30 or R30 company 


F30 Partner
* they created their 1st shift less than 30 days ago, which is determined by the company’s first_gig_at field

R30 Partner
* (resurrected in the last 30 days) is when the company’s is_resurrected_partner is set to True
* Ex. test_user_001 demo_business_01
Have the F30 or R30 Partner create a shift
Go to the "shift group" table in AdminPortal -> Click on the shift group created above -> Click on "Check worker access" -> enter the logged in Pro's user id -> click "Check")

Under the "Dispatch" section, check both "Shift Group access tier" and "Worker access tier"

And wait until "Shift Group access tier" reaches "tier 2"

** Note that if your "Worker access tier" is not 2, it means the Pro is NOT a roster of this Partner. 

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/ghi12345-3333-4444-5555-666666666662)
Once "Shift Group access tier" reaches tier 2 (which should now be the same as "Worker access tier" that's already in tier 2), pull to refresh the "Open shifts" screen in pro app to view the shift
Note the shift created above (in step 2) on "Open shifts"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Pro should see the "RECOMMENDED 2X POINTS" tag

  ![](index.php?/attachments/get/ghi12345-3333-4444-5555-666666666661)

custom_steps_separated.content: Tap on the shift to navigate to the shift detail screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Pro should see 
- A "RECOMMENDED 2X POINTS" tag
- with a callout card content: "Earn 2x points towards tTop Pro when you complete this shift successfully! Learn more" on top (if there are other callouts, may need to swipe the carousel to see it)


  ![](index.php?/attachments/get/ghi12345-3333-4444-5555-666666666663)

custom_steps_separated.content: Tap on the "Learn more" link on the callout card.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
tapping that callout opens the FAQ article (A "RECOMMENDED" text should be displayed at the bottom of the help page)

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/ghi12345-3333-4444-5555-666666666664)

custom_steps_separated.content:
Navigate back to Open shifts screen, and tap on the notification icon at top-right corner

  ![](index.php?/attachments/get/ghi12345-3333-4444-5555-666666666665)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Notification number should be increased on the notification icon indicating a new notification has been added
2. In the "Notifications" screen, a new "Recommended shift - 2x Top Pro Points" notification should show up
   ![](index.php?/attachments/get/ghi12345-3333-4444-5555-666666666666)

custom_steps_separated.content: Tap on the new "Recommended shift" notification
custom_steps_separated.expected: Pro should be redirected to the corresponding recommended shift detail screen
